popups.title: Había un Pueblo
popups.description: Explore and find myths and legends from Colombia's culture! Interact with fun characters, solve puzzles and beat minigames to put myths back in their book. I coded all this project's features, from minigame logic to user interface.
popups.useslist:
Applied practical knowledge in this project includes:
   • Terrain generation with Rule Tiles.
   • Dialogue system with Scriptable Objects.
   • OOP concepts such as abstraction and inheritance.

popups.title: Wizard's Backyard
popups.description:
Collect as many balloons as you can while flying through the air with a leaf blower!. Playable solo or with up to 8 people online.
 I contributed to the programming of obstacles and collectables, as well as some of the player systems.
popups.useslist:
Applied practical knowledge in this project includes:
   • Object Pooling pattern.
   • Unity Photon for online multiplayer.
   • Physics-oriented movement.

popups.title: Hamster Roller
popups.description: A platformer in which you play as a hamster that can chapeshift to traverse obstacles and collect sunflower seeds. I programmed the mechanic involving changing shapes, as well as the collectables' logic and win and lose conditions.
popups.useslist:
Applied practical knowledge in this project includes:
   • State machines pattern.
   • Blend Trees use.
   • Prefabs use.

popups.title: Los Duendes Salvan la Navidad
popups.description: An arcade game in which Santa Claus chases and collects elves to increase his gift counter and avoid running out of time. I was in charge of programming the player's and the elves' movement, as well as the game's main mechanics.
popups.useslist:
Applied practical knowledge in this project includes:
   • Use of Prefabs variants.
   • Terrain building with Rule Tiles.
   • Blend Trees use.

popups.title: No Más Alergias
popups.description: An educational game for browsers and Android devices. The game’s purpose is to explain to children what allergies are and how to treat them with immunotherapy. Developed for the pharma company Inmunotek.
popups.useslist:
Applied practical knowledge in this project includes:
   • Singleton pattern.
   • Animator Override Controllers use.
   • Drag and Drop interfaces implementation.

popups.title: Robot Mafia
popups.description: A currently in development puzzle and action game in which the player uses reflections to bounce their bullets on mirrors to eliminate enemies. The game features a variety of mechanisms, enemies and boss fights.
popups.useslist:
Applied practical knowledge in this project includes:
  • Object pooling pattern.
  • Interfaces and abstract classes.
    • State machines
  • Scriptable Objects

popups.title: LaIA
popups.description: LaIA is a mascot for an university advertising campaign promoting the institutional accreditation of Universidad Autónoma de Occidente. My contributions consisted of animating the mascot for the campaign in a variety of situations. The mascot had a presence in both longer form videos and short advertising animations.
popups.useslist:
Applied practical knowledge in this project includes:
   • Animating in After Effects.
   • Lip Syncing.
   • Using Illustrator and After Effects dynamically.

popups.title: Sentidos FundAutónoma
popups.description: A commercial for the nonprofit organization by Universidad Autónoma de Occidente. I visited the organization to direct and film the commercial.
popups.useslist:
Applied practical knowledge in this project includes:
   • Rotobrush in After Effects.
   • Audio recording with Avid Pro Tools.
   • Dynamic link use with Premiere Pro and After Effects.

popups.title: Reel La Agencia UAO
popups.description: A video I edited presenting the services, products and clients of La Agencia UAO, the advertising agency where I worked during my internship.
popups.useslist:
Applied practical knowledge in this project includes:
   • After Effects' 3D Camera.
   • Music and video sync in Premiere Pro.
   • Dynamic link use with Premiere Pro and After Effects.

popups.title: Video caso 50 Años UAO
popups.description: A case-study video for Universidad Autónoma de Occidente. The video takes a deep dive into the process that took place to design the branding for the university’s 50-year anniversary.
popups.useslist:
Applied practical knowledge in this project includes:
   • Use of After Effects' motion blur.
   • Text animation in After Effects.
   • Dynamic link use with Premiere Pro and After Effects.

popups.title: Estudiantinas Promo Videos
popups.description: Shorts created from filmed material to promote the release of music videos by the Estudiantinas Regionales, a nation-wide group of traditional Colombian music performers.
popups.useslist:
Applied practical knowledge in this project includes:
   • Camera panning to adapt storytelling to a vertical format.
   • Repurposing existing content to create original material.
   • Synchronizing video and audio musically through editing.
